flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Mobile Bulk SMS Software presenting by www.bulksmsgroup.com is capable top send messages in multiple languages as per your need and requirement. Software supports pocket PC, PDA device and desktop to send bulk of messages.
guide.introduction_rendered: Mobile Bulk SMS Software presenting by www.bulksmsgroup.com is capable top send messages in multiple languages as per your need and requirement. Software supports pocket PC, PDA device and desktop to send bulk of messages.
guide.summary: Fastest and business effective Mobile Bulk SMS Software offering by www.bulksmsgroup.com website offers safe and reliable way to send bulk of messages to multiple cell phone users without having any professional knowledge or prior training.
guide.title: Mobile Bulk SMS Software
